Title: Justified
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Walton Goggins, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts, Natalie Zea, Erica N. Tazel, Nick Searcy, Jeremy Davies, Abby Miller, Alicia Witt, Kaitlyn Dever, Patton Oswalt, Sam Elliott, Mykelti Williamson, Jere Burns, Michael Rapaport, Damon Herriman, David Meunier, Jim Beaver, Neal McDonough, Margo Martindale, Raymo
Plot: U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens is a modern day 19th century-style lawman, enforcing his brand of justice in a way that puts a target on his back with criminals and places him at odds with his bosses in the Marshal service. That conflict results in a reassignment for Givens to the U.S. District covering the town where he grew up. He is an anachronism - a tough, soft spoken gentleman who finds his quarry fascinating, but never gives an inch. Dig under his placid skin and you'll find an angry man who grew up hard in rural Kentucky, with an outlaw father, who knows a lot more about who he doesn't want to be than who he really is.
